mapper.select: select u.id uid, u.username, u.password, u.salt, u.islocked, r.id rid, r.name rname, p.id pid, p.name pname from sys_users u inner join sys_users_roles ur on ur.user_id = u.id inner join sys_roles r on r.id = ur.role_id inner join sys_roles_permissions pr on pr.role_id = r.id inner join sys_permissions p on pr.permission_id = p.id where u.username = #{username}
